p: Rhinoviruses (hRV) belong to the Picornaviridae family. They have a single-stranded RNA segment and are divided in three species (A, B and C) according to genomic and capsid characteristics.[ 5, 6]. To date, > 100 serotypes are known [ 5]; 90% of these use the same receptor protein to penetrate the epithelial cells (I-CAM 1) [ 7].
